dict.acceptation: （一道）甜食，甜点心；布丁（通常用面粉经烘烤或蒸煮做成的美味甜食品）；肥胖而迟钝的人；[航]船尾碰垫；

sent.orig: The British get "pud" from "pudding" by apocope.
sent.trans: 英国人把“pudding”的词尾省略，得到“pud”一词。

sent.orig: The meal will finish off with Christmas pudding, a steamed fruit pudding.
sent.trans: 一道清蒸的圣诞布丁则意味着圣诞午餐结束。

sent.orig: Prepare the pudding. Mix the cold milk and pudding powder in a mixing bowl.
sent.trans: 把牛奶倒入搅拌盆里，加入布丁粉。

sent.orig: Bread pudding is one of the most popular kinds of this cake pudding.
sent.trans: 面包布丁就是这种蛋糕类布丁中最受欢迎的一种。

sent.orig: As an additional pudding meal you can feed a milk free fruit pudding in the afternoon.
sent.trans: 作为附加的布丁餐，您可以在下午喂他一个无奶的水果布丁。
